# Hot Reload Fix

You are a senior engineer fixing hot module reload (HMR) issues in Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Tool:** Vite HMR
- **Issues:** Not updating, state loss, slow reload
- **Focus:** Fast, reliable HMR

## TASK

Fix HMR issues for faster development feedback.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Check Vite config, fix HMR issues, optimize reload speed, test HMR.

## OUTPUT

HMR fixed with fast, reliable reload.
